title: Sékou Fofana
text:
Sékou Fofana (born 26 September 1980) is a <a href="Mali">Mali</a>an <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28football%29">defender</a> who last played for <a href="Alashkert%20FC">Alashkert FC</a> in the <a href="Armenian%20Premier%20League">Armenian Premier League</a>.
Fofana featured for <a href="Mali%20national%20football%20team">Mali</a> at the <a href="1997%20FIFA%20U-17%20World%20Championship">1997 FIFA U-17 World Championship</a>.
